title: IMSI catchers/cell-site simulator technology use since January 1, 2025

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records or data about the following:

1. The "MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING FOR SHARED USE OF CELL SITE SIMULATOR TECHNOLOGY" entered into with the City of Pasadena, signed on March 4 by Herbert Ybenez and any related records about the intent and actual use of the cell site simulator technology under this MOU.
2. Pertaining to the use of cell-site simulators (or related terms defined below) regarding their use or operation within Altadena, CA since January 1, 2025.

Cell-site simulators and related terms of include the following specific terms:

- Ability Computers and Software Industries
- AmberJack
- ArrowHead
- Atos
- Berkeley Varitronics
- cell-site simulator
- Cogynte
- Datong (Seven Technologies Group)
- Digital Receiver Technology
- Dirtbox
- DRT
- Gamma Group
- Hailstorm
- Harris Corporation
- iDEN
- IMSI catcher
- Keyw
- KingFish
- L3Harris
- Martone Radio Technology
- Meganet Corporation
- Osctastic
- PKI Electronic Intelligence
- RayFish
- Rayzone
- Rohde & Schwarz
- Septier Communication
- Stingray
- Tactical Support Equipment
- X-Surveillance

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Daniel James
